alert.note: Alert for Assumption; Eastern Ascension; Lower Terrebonne; Southern Livingston; St. Charles; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 12:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF ST. JOHN THE BAPTIST, CENTRAL ASCENSION, ST. JAMES, NORTHWESTERN ST. CHARLES, WESTERN TERREBONNE, SOUTHEASTERN LIVINGSTON, NORTHWESTERN LAFOURCHE AND ASSUMPTION PARISHES THROUGH 1230 AM CST... At 1159 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Whitehall to near Patterson. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Houma, Thibodaux, Napoleonville, Reserve, Hahnville, Laplace, Gramercy, Lutcher, Sorrento, French Settlement, Schriever, Montz, Garyville, Supreme, Raceland, Chackbay, Bayou Cane, Whitehall, Killona, and Norco. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 183 and 218. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
